title: Mubarakan
writer: Rupinder Chahal, Rajesh Chawla, Balwinder Singh Janjua
short_cast: Anil Kapoor, Arjun Kapoor, Ileana D'Cruz, Athiya Shetty, Neha Sharma, Vineet Kumar Singh, Pavan Malhotra, Ratna Pathak Shah, Karan Kundra, Anil Mange, Rahul Dev, Sanjay Kapoor

desc: Chaos ensues after two orphaned twin brothers raised apart team up with their eccentric, unmarried uncle to find a solution to their romantic woes.
